newsitem.title: USA: Donna Karan has no comment on CEO report.
newsitem.headline: Donna Karan has no comment on CEO report.

text.p: A spokeswoman for Donna Karan International Inc said the company had no comment at present on a Wall Street Journal report that it was looking for an outside executive to take over the day-to-day operations and possibly the post of chief executive.
"We can't make any comment right now," she told Reuters.
The Journal said that Donna Karan would remain chairman and chief designer, but would hand over the daily running of the company to an outsider with a stronger financial background.
The fashion house has been struggling to combat its low share price and weak earnings, and recently announced a $4.8 million cost-cutting program in a bid to boost both.
The stock price has declined from the initial public offering price of $24 a share to $12 at Wednesday's close.
Shares rose 3/4 to 12-3/4 in early trading on Thursday.
